lines.text: Education is progress! Now what have you got against it?
I don't have anything against education - as long as it doesn't interfere with your thinking!
Hey, Joe, do you know the difference between a table and an ottoman?
Then take your feet off the table!
He'll never learn to do that.
[Hoss reluctantly agrees to serve as a temporary deputy sheriff]
I'll swear you in. Do you?
Let's go back to the Ponderosa, Pa. This isn't any of our affair.
We can't ignore the rest of the world. We're the only stabilizing influence in the country.
